artifact.reason: Messaging API endpoint. Extend to handle teacher-student messaging with relationship validation and tenant isolation.
User model with teacherId field. Use to validate teacher-student relationship (student.teacherId === teacher.id).

constraints.constraint: Relationship validation: Validate teacher-student relationship exists (teacher owns student) before allowing messaging
Tenant isolation: Teacher can only message their students - enforce in API
Recipient filtering: Teachers see their students in recipient selector, students see their teacher
Conversation filtering: Filter conversations by teacher-student relationship
Component pattern: Follow existing component patterns from components/messaging/ - use TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, proper prop types

interface.name: POST /api/messages (teacher-student)

tests.standards: Testing approach: Integration tests for API endpoint with teacher-student validation, component tests for recipient selector, tenant isolation tests. Focus on relationship validation correctness, tenant isolation, and recipient filtering. Test edge cases: invalid teacher-student pairs, teacher messaging non-student, student messaging non-teacher. Manual testing for messaging UI and user experience.
tests.locations: Integration tests: Test API endpoint via browser dev tools Network tab or Postman Component tests: Test recipient selector filtering No formal test framework currently configured - focus on manual testing and code review
